argument.name: options
argument.description: Optional. The name of an A5 object. See Object Types for possible values.

page.description: Returns event transaction count (all for an object if unspecified, else specific flags).
page.discussion: The A5.TRANSACTION_COUNTER() method fires an event every time an Alpha Five window opens or closes. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
